Hey! I told you I'm not some wizard! And I'm not some lowlife who would force her to lose!Though seein' more of her isn't a loss in my books either.

state.text: HOLY SHI-
EVELYNN?!
SHE'S HERE?!

case.state: Say, Missy Fortune. Do you happen to be part of a pirate crew of sorts?
Pardon me, Missy Fortune. You don;t happen to be a pirate captain now do you?
Well, most the time I'd be inclined to say yes, but the reason is I know a lass back home with the same name. Well, that and I sense a strange connection.
You certainly are readin' me like a book, but tonight's a bit different. I know a lass by the same name back home. Not only that, I sense a strange connection here tonight...
I'll be damned... Well I see the similarities now, Fortune. From the looks of my cards, you were a orphan of sorts, correct? Picked up by this Fishbone Gang crew?
Well consider me surprised. We're more similar than I initially thought, Fortune. The card's are tellin' me you were a lone child taken in by this Fishbone Gang, correct?
Say, Missy Fortune, I can tell somethin' ain't natural about you right now. What exactly are you plannin'?
Hold on just a second, Missy Fortune. I can tell when someones up to no good and that looks plastered all over your face. What are ya plannin' over there?

state.text: So Jessie, ya' say you're some kind of adult star, yeah? S'pose that means we're both quite skilled with our hands, just in different ways.

case.state: I can't help but ask, Miss Pyrrha. Could you tell me more 'bout these "Huntresses" and "Huntsmen" you mentioned earlier?
Say, Saki, this may a bit much, even from me, but have ya ever thought 'bout givin' head with, well, just your head?
What the hell? You're just summoning in helpers like that?! At least be sneaky with your cheatin'!

state.text: I'm watchin' ya closely clown. Pull anything shifty and ya got a card to the face!
It brings such a smile to my face to see such a lil' lass wearing such a vibrant hat. Wear that hat with pride, lil' one.
What's the point of havin' that apple on ya at all times when I haven't seen ya take a single bite outta it? Waste of a good snack if you ask me.
Any reason you're just carryin' an uneaten apple with ya all the time?
So I've heard some muffled whisperin' around here that you have quite the poker player on your ship, Meia. Mind me askin' a bit about her?
Quite the fancy bit of equipment ya got on ya, Meia. Seems your crew's got money to spare.
So I see you're quite the informed lady when it comes to fashion sense. Let's hear what you think of my outfit then. I'm quite the good looker, no?
You've got quite the cocky attitude on ya missy. If you ran your tongue in Bilgewater as much as you do here you'd be in quite the heap of trouble.
So you are like some sort of dimension jumper then? Ya ever bump into some small orange haired girl? High voice, obnoxious, loud mouthed. I could say more but it'd go on for hours.
I gotta ask, out of all the dimensions you've explored, have you ever met anyone else who can use cards as a weapon? I wouldn't be surprised if I was the only one.
I'm noticin' those eyes of yours have yet to open once so far. Ya got some hideous injury you're hidin' or are ya just lackin' in the sleep department?
You seem to be quite the avid eater based on that snack you got there... Hmm, I wonder, are you a drinker at all, Erufuda?
Well then, If I had a silver serpent for every living statue I've met, I'd have two silver serpents, which isn't a lot but it's still odd it's happened twice.
So then, Miss Galatea. I must ask, what brings you to this fine establishment? You seem a bit more cultured than most of the bunch here.
Ya'know, Orendi, you should come back with me some time and we should get you out on Summoners Rift sometime. I'm sure you'd fit right into that hodgepodge of chaos.
You seem like the everyday school girl, Ayano. That makes me even more curious on your reasoning for bein' here. If ya don't mind that is.
Gotta say, Ayano, you seem to be tryin' awfully hard to be as unnoticeable as possible. Most people wouldn't pick up the cues, but as a fellow shifty stranger, I've learnt the tricks as well.
That's quite the stylish armor set you've got on ya, Miss Pyrrha. Can't say I've seen somethin' quite like it before.
I must say, that armor that you've got, Pyrrha, is awfully exotic. Can't say I've seen anything like it before.
Ain't it a bit unnecessary to carry such a large blade like that with ya at all times? I'd figure at that point it starts to become overkill.
Don'tcha think that blade is a bit unnecessarily large? I almost mistook it for some gag weapon at first.
Hilda, was it? Gotta say, you don't seem like the typical type of folk for this kind of scene. What brings you to such a place?
Hilda, right? You seem a bit too... whats the word... upper-class to be in such a place. Mind me askin' whats the reason for your appearance here?
Hammer bigger than the wielder, fuzzy ears, short, all you're missin' is a body full of fur and you'd be just like that ticking time bomb of a Yordle, Poppy. Always looking for her "Hero".
You don't happen to be lookin' for some kind of hero do ya? I know this little Yordle back in Runeterra who wields a hammer bout same size as yours. Name was Poppy, I believe.
So you say you're makin' an article about this place, yea? Are you some kind of reporter? If ya' want, Bilgewater will never have a shortage of stories to report on.
So you're makin' an article 'bout this place? I'm takin' it you're a reporter of sorts then? You should follow me to Bilgewater then. Plenty of stories there.
No offense, Miss... Senko, was it? You seem a bit too soft for a place like this. Ya sure you didn't enter the wrong building?
Pardon my words if they sound rude here, but you didn't happen to enter the wrong building, did you, Senko? You just seem a bit soft for this kind of place.
Seems I'm not the only serious player tonight. Though our reasons seem to differ quite a bit. Care to elaborate on the stiff aura you're puttin' off?
Well now, another serious player. Now that I look a bit closer, you're lookin' awfully stiff. Mind if I ask why?
So you're one of those hidden identity type folk, hm? I never got the point of that. I personally try to get my name out there. That's kinda the whole point to me at least.

You're one of those hidden identity folk, eh? Never understood why people do that. I personally want people to know who Twisted Fate is. It also brings out the fun type who think they can take me down.
Well now, I don't s'pose you offer personal fitness lessons with a body like that? Maybe somethin' a bit more hands on?
Only fitting for a fitness trainer to have a body built like a temple. You don't happen to offer more personal or hands on fitness lessons, do you?
It's not often I bump into someone similar to myself, let alone one as good lookin' as yourself. How long have you been part of the gamblin' lifestyle?
Well now, not only do I meet a fellow card shark, but a fine lookin one at that. Do tell, how long have you been livin' life at the table?
So we've got a mute and a robot that talks enough to make up for it and then some. What the hell led to you two bein' a thing?
Man, this feels like the set up to some cheesy joke. A mute and a chatterbox AI walk into a bar. What the hell led to you two being a thing?
So, We've got a supposedly crazy intelligent A.I. playing poker with us. Don't suppose you're usin' some hi-tech X-ray vision strategy to help your friend out, are ya?
Gotta say, as much as I like a challenge at the table, playing with a supposedly intelligent A.I. feels a bit unfair. He could easily be helping his partner with some X-ray vision.
If the doctors I had back in Bilgewater looked nearly as fine as yourself, Miss Angela, I reckon I'd end up injurin' myself more often.
You mentioned somethin' earlier about being a goddess. I must ask, what are you a goddess of?
So you say you're some sort of goddess? What exactly are you the goddess of then?
Seem's Lil' Crownguard has trailed quite far from home. I can't help but ask for you're reasonin' for such an action.
We're awfully far from Demacia, Lil' Crownguard. So what's the occasion? I doubt the Noble Family would approve of such a thing.
Well I'll be damned, those gauntlets ya got there are quite the feat. There's a brutish lady over in Piltover with somethin' like yours but about five times bigger.
Some fancy lookin' gauntlets ya got there, partner. Gotta say though, a lady I know from Piltover who's got a similar thing but its 'bout five times bigger.
That mask of yours... It's quite the bold fashion statement. There doesn't happen to be some strange story behind it, does there?
That's quite the unique lookin' mask you're sportin' there, Miss. Mind me askin' if there's some story behind it?
Correct me if I'm wrong, Miss, but it seems you talk of some lil' posse quite a bit. Got some buds in crime or somethin'?
If I'm not mistaken, you've mentioned some kind of lil' posse, no? They some partners in crime of yours?
I gotta say, Missy. You seem a bit too excited to be playin' tonight. I mean, I could feel you shakin' in excitement from here.
I must ask, Missy, Aren'tcha a bit too excited for the game tonight? I mean you're practically shakin' outta you're skin o'er there.

case.state: If I'm hearin' ya correctly, it sounds as if you're trainin' to be a warrior of sorts, correct?
I've been listenin' in durin' our game and it sounds like you're aimin' to be a warrior, correct?

state.text: The more you talk of these lil' Pokemon creatures, the more i think we may have somethin' similar out in Runeterra.
You know, I'm startin' to think we have our own lil Pokemon of sorts in Runeterra the more I hear ya talk of it.
I'm gettin' a strange feel off of ya... You don't happen to take part in team battles with a bunch of other weird folk, do ya?
Somethin' about you feels familiar. Do you happen to take part in big ol' team based battles with some other strange folk?
Pardon me, Marth, but how do you keep such a fine figure? I've never seen a guy with such beautiful features in Bilgewater.
Excuse the intrusion, Marth, but how in the world do you hold such a beautiful shape? Don't think I've ever seen a guy in Bilge look with features like yours.
Well now, they must make robots come with hypnotic abilities now, 'cause I can't seem to pull my eyes away from you, Miss Penny.
Your creator must have given you hypnotic abilities, Miss Penny, 'cause I can't seem to take my eyes off of you.
Hot damn, that's quite the fine hat you got, Miss. Though I can't say I'd ever see myself wearing one of such size.
Well, I'll be damned. With a hat like that, I'm assumin' size must matter to ya big time.
Pardon me, Miss Mia, but I've gotta ask about that strange lookin' necklace you're wearin'. Somethin' about it is really grabbin' my interest.
That's an awfully odd necklace you're sportin' there, Miss Mia. Hope ya don't mind me askin' bit more 'bout it?
Long blue hair tied into twin tails, musician, finely dressed. You're almost like this fine lady I know of named Sona. Only difference is you're not mute.
Well hot damn, you're just like this lady I know back in Runeterra. Blue twin tails, musician, finely dressed, only difference is shes a mute.
Word on the street, Miss Pauling, is you're practically a head of a mercenary group. I'm quite curious personally, due to my old hitman group bein' of a similar nature.
Correct me if I'm wrong, Miss Pauling, but I've heard you're the head of a mercenary group? I used to be part of a hitman group not to long ago myself.
The way you speak seems to imply you're quite the fan of your job, but I can't quite tell what it is ya do. Mind elaboratin' a lil' bit for me?
You sure seem to enjoy that job of yours, but I can't quite figure out what it is. Mind tellin' bit more 'bout what it is you even do?

case.state: I never did ask much about you actually bein' a fighter. What's your style? Magic user, archer, up and close brawler, or somethin' else along those lines?
You know, Miss Crownguard, Demacia is quite the point of interest to me. Always have held a grudge toward them.
No offense, Miss Crownguard, but Demacia has been quite the point of interest for me, in a grudge bearing way.
So, on the mage topic, I've heard a few rumors here and there that you helped a convicted felon terrorize Demacia and escape. That's a bit hard to believe lookin' at you now.
So now that you're out and on the run, Miss Crownguard, where ya plannin' on goin'?
Gotta say, never thought I'd see a Demacian in such a state. The regal type there ain't much for strippin' in the public.
You know Faye, those glasses of yours are quite the double edged sword. Yeah, we may not be able to read your eyes, but there's quite the reflection to them
As helpful as it is to cover your expression with those glasses, you're also givin' away your cards in the reflection
So I hear you're a bounty hunter on top of the gamblin' life. We're soundin' more and more alike by the second. What's your strategy when balancin' the two jobs?
So, Miss Senko, you strive to pamper and please all those around you, correct?
If I'm hearin' correctly, Miss Senko, your goal is to pamper and please all those around you, correct?
If all the angels are as forward as you are, Panty, I can't help but ask what demons are like?
With a supposed angel as raunchy as yourself, Panty, I can't help but ask what the demons are like?
How much persuadin' would it take to get some one on one action tonight, Panty?
I don't suppose it would take much persuadin' to get some private time after the game tonight, Panty?
Now why in the world would you need your firearm in such a pla---
Oh for fuck's sake! She's takin' aim again!
I'm just gonna preemptively duck before a stray bullet takes my head off.
Someone take her damn gun away from her!
There is no way she plans to take off that little thing with a bullet, right?!
So, Miss Penny. What brings you to The Inventory this fine night? Any specific goals in mind?
I must say, I'm quite interested in your goals here tonight, Miss Penny. Anythin' specific in mind?
If we've already got a date planned, I believe it's only fair we get to know each other a bit more, Angela. What would be your dream date night?
I'd say it's only fair we get to know each other a bit better with our upcomin' date, Angela. So, whats your dream date night?
You know, Angela. You don't need an angelic outfit when you've already got the beauty of one, if not more. So there must be some other purpose to it, no?
I must ask you, Lucina. What's the point of coverin' such a beautiful face when you could rope in any guy you want with it, myself included?
Sucrose, was it? Gotta say, that outfit you're sporting is quite the fashionable look. Really adds to that cute charm of yours.
Sucrose, right? Can't help but compliment your outfit tonight. It's quite the perfect addition to the cute look you're rockin'.
I gotta say, Miss Cynthia. It's quite a shame that you have to strip out of such a fine outfit. Are you a big fashion fan yourself?
So if I'm understandin' right, you're a sort of pirate, no? You sure don't seem like many of the pirates I've seen back in Bilgewater.
I must say, you've got quite the strong aura to ya, Miss Laevatein. You must have an absolute body of steel under those clothes of yours, correct?
You know, the more I hear from you tonight, the harder it is to tell if you're a well disguised robot, or just the most serious gal I've met. Mind enlightenin' me?
While I hate to the mockin' bird tonight, I can't help but ask how different it feels to run on your artificial legs. I'd assume it took quite some adjustment.
There sure seems to be quite a bit of energy in that small body of yours, Emi. I'm assumin' you're an athlete of sorts then?
Well, I must say, it's not often I find such a fine looking lady with a fiery side to rival my own. Say, you happen to be busy after tonight?
I'll be damned, A lady with looks and attitude to rival my own. That's quite the find. Say, You don't happen to be free after tonight's game do you, Stocking?
With an outfit like that, Senko, I can't help but let my imagination roam.
I can't help but wonder if your tail or ears are as sensitive as the rest of your body, Miss Senko.
Your pampering shouldn't come one sided, Miss Senko. So tell me, how do you like to be pleasur- I mean, pampered.
I'd be lying if i said I wasn't waiting all night for this moment, Miss Senko. Though, I'm not sure how long I'll be able to hold back afterwards.
My oh my. It ain't a common occurrence I find a lady who can pull off the Gothic look like you do, Stocking. Though, I'd much rather see you after you pull off any clothing you have on.
I've met, and bedded, quite a few ladies like yourself, Sucrose. Nose to the books, acting all innocent and pure. But I know what's in that head of yours.
So, Jason. What's a lady as fine as yourself doin' in a place like this? Lookin' for a fun time I s'pose?
College gal, huh? I could imagine all that schoolin's got you're nerves quite high, Miss. I assume ya came here to relieve some of that stress then?
College must be quite the stressful deal back home, Miss Mari. I don't suppose you're reason for comin' out here is to help wash way some those trouble, no?
Correct me if I'm wrong, miss, but from the sounds of it, you're quite the talented pianist, no?
You're lookin' awfully shaky over there, Miss Tomoko. If ya need, I'm sure I could help hold you steady.
You're lookin' like quite the shaky mess, Miss Tomoko. Ya don't happen to need my help with holdin' ya steady, do ya?
It's quite easy to tell you aren't too experienced with this situation, miss. Unless I'm readin' ya all wrong, that is.
Not often that I get to meet a genuine demon such as yourself, Charlie. Say, you don't happen to have some experience with deals, do ya?
Well I'll be damned. Can't say meetin' someone like you is an often ooccurrence Charlie. Say how experienced with deals are you?
You've got quite the elegance to your speakin', Miss Yuri. And the poems you speak of are quite beautiful. Granted not as much as yourself.
Your manner of speakin' is quite elegant, Miss Yuri. The poems you speak of have a beauty only rivaled by your own as well.
Pardon me, Miss, I can't help but point out that unique hairstyle. They're like two majestic wings befitting the lovely angel they're attached to.
So, Janet. A fine lady like yourself must have quite the eventful life, would you say that excitement keeps up in your private times?
Now I know I've already commented on your fine looks, Hilda, but I don't think there is enough praise to truly tell you how perfect you look.
Lady Luck you devilish gal. You decided to bless me with the presence of a absolute fine looking gal like Mari tonight. Tell me, Miss, what brings you out tonight?
Well now! Ain't often I meet someone with a stronger accent than my own, and quite the good lookin' gal at that.
So, you're a navigator of sorts, correct? Didn't know there was a need of an entire profession for that. You must know quite a bit about it, no?
You said you're a navigator earlier, Nami. Can't say I've ever seen one person dedicated to the task. I'd assume you know a lot 'bout it, then?
Before we get into the topic of Bilgewater, I'd say there's a much more interestin' story standin' in front of you.
Say... This may be a bit much, even for myself, but have you ever thought of givin' head with it off?
Some day in the near future you should really join me in a gamblin' run back in Bilgewater. We could make a killin'.
You should really join me on a gamblin' run back in Bilgewater sometime in the future. Imagine the money we'd rake in.
I reckon such a fine-lookin' woman such as yourself shouldn't be too worried about a loss or two.
I'm sure everyone here wouldn't mind seeing some more of you.
Now now, don't get too worked up, Ma'am. I'm sure you'll do better soon.
If ya need, I'll gladly hold onto any clothing you'd feel uncomfortable leavin' around the bar.
Let's see what beauty you've got hidin' away from us.
It wont take a lot to impress me on looks compared to the girls back in Bilgewater. Having all your teeth is a major plus.
You ain't gonna go and try to charm me in a weak state are ya now? I sure wouldn't complain.
Don't worry about the handsome charmer over here. I won't go starin' at your beauty too much.

state.text: If you need me to go for a round two sometime, don't be afraid to ask.
Just think, You somehow beat the one and only Twisted Fate. Now them's some braggin' rights
At least we still get quite the amazing show after a loss here.

case.state: As much as I'd rather you lost while I was still in, I still appreciate you throwin' just to give me a show, darling.
Sorry, darlin', The nice guy trick runs out in the late game.

Don't worry your soft little head too much over a loss or two, darling, Just gotta even the playing field a bit.
What can I say? Being in such a desperate state causes me to resort to desperate measures, simple as that.
Seem's Lady Luck is feelin' quite torn tonight.

state.text: Now now, Lady Luck, I understand ya ain't a fan of pickin' favorites, but ya cant go doin' this.

case.state: Ain't this a bit ridiculous, Lady Luck? Just pick a winner.

state.text: Don'tcha think you should be caref- aaaand there it goes.

Now why was he even allowed to bring that in in the first place?!

How the hell do you even still have your ~clothing~?!
Ya'know, you'd expect strip poker to be a prominent thing back in Bilgewater. Guess they care more 'bout suckerin' people outta their money than their pants.
Here's a bit of a gambler's perspective for ya. The more someone's wearing, the more they're worth. ~Name~ is a prime example.
Every piece of clothing I own has quite a few stories attached to it. I'm sure your ~clothing~ ain't much different.
C'mon now, give us a reason to chase after you.

case.state: (Better keep a close eye on what ~target~ ends up takin' off. May be somethin' of value)

Seein' what everyone chooses to strip as the game goes on really helps you learn more 'bout 'em. They may be ballsy and strip it all right away!

C'mon now, at least make my loss worth something.
Better make sure to give me a reason to enjoy myself.
Don't let my charming looks distract you from stripping now.

state.text: Must've been awfully fond of your ~clothing~ to wait so long. I know the feelin'.

case.state: You see, belts aren't only for utility, but for looks too. I'm sure ~target~ understands.

state.text: With or without your glasses, partner, you're lookin' as good as ever.

case.state: Not too often ya see a man as fashionably knowledgeable to wear gloves. Consider me impressed, ~target~.

Disgraceful...
Scum...
Unforgivable...

state.text: Nothin' wrong with taking it slow.

You're tellin' me you'd rather strip the small bits than show off the goods?

case.state: Somethin' bout your ~clothing~ keep's catchin' my eyes. They got some sort of enchantment on 'em?

Every game usually has one chicken.

case.state: We can put some money on the line as well if it'll make ya feel any better. I know I would.

case.state: That... gives me ideas I shouldn't be thinkin' of...

Lets see what you've been hidin' away from us all game.

case.state: Don't worry, my hands are a bit too preoccupied for me to get swipey at the moment.
I'm sure it's gettin' quite hot under all that clothing. Why not lighten your load a bit
Don't go thinkin you can up an' leave after this one. We're all stickin' this game through to the end.
You really think I would let'cha go without makin' sure ya come with me?
Ya might want to keep your ~clothing~ around for a bit. Unless there's a clean-up crew nearby.
I wouldn't be too worried about where to put your ~clothing~. Probably will get stained no matter where it is.

state.text: Ya'know there are ways to avoid falling into such a perilous situation. Ways I'm not to disclose, but there are ways none the less.
Somethin's tellin' me you're in quite the sticky situation. If ya'd like, I may be able to throw some assistance your way for some compensation.
If only it was this easy with some of the folks over in Bilgewater. There, ya either gotta pay or threaten... I'm not much for the second option in this situation.

case.state: Now, dont go feelin' pressured just cause Im still dressed while youre in dire straits. Ill be strippin' myself in due time.
Hold on a damn second! You can't just bring in more clothes! That's outright blatant cheatin'!
Now why would they even come here in the first place...

state.text: Talk about a weak stomach...
Now that is commitment. I must say you've earned my respect as a gambler.
The wits of a true gambler, brings a tear to my eye.
Quite the odd choice but interesting none the less.
Well I'll be damned! It's the actual lady under that odd lookin' suit! Gotta say, love this look much more than the last.
No need to be shy, darling. I'm sure you'll look just as breathtaking underneath all that clothing.
I reckon you'll be out soon, so why not go out with a bang, yeah?
Now now, I'm sure you've got everyone here enchanted already. No need to try and impress us more than you have.

case.state: You wouldn't mind makin' this a bit easier on my imagination would'ja?
If ya didn't already know, they're are ways you can help me here without any physical contact.
My imagination can only do so much for me ya'know. Why not lend a bit of help?
A woman of your looks is already quite the sight, but I'm sure it'll only get better each time you lose ~name~.
And just like that, the order is restored. It's only fair we all get a view whenever you lose, you know.
So ya finally came out with the truth huh? 'Bout time. It was quite obvious the ditzy valley girl deal was an act.

state.text: Ya oughta be more careful, young lady. Don't wanna go payin' more than you owe now. Well, unless I'm your opponent that is.
Seems luck's messin' with yer mind a bit. Either that or somethin' here is distractin' ya.
Ah that's nothing ma'am. That's a scratch compared to the shit I've seen in Bilgewater. Don't get yourself too worked up.
Wear your scars with pride. They show you dedication and determination for your beliefs.
A scar simply shows you have the strength to take a blow and keep pushing forward. Many should respect you for that.

case.state: Why, I think it looks perfect on you. Though I must say, I'd prefer it in the corner of the room instead.

state.text: Of all the treasures and riches I've found, nothin' compares to this view.
Ya' know, some places would put you behind bars for strippin' in public like this. Only matters if you get caught though.
Till this day, I never thought I'd see somethin' more pleasin' to the eyes than that succubus Evelynn, but seems you've proven me wrong.
Suddenly, we have a new contender for best-looking in the Inventory.
And just like that, all eyes are locked on you.

case.state: Seem's I'll owe ya after tonight with this free show your givin' me.
Hope ya don't mind if my eyes just never leave your body.
A fine lady with looks and charms to rival mine. Seems we may be perfect for each other.

state.text: I'll be damned, seems you got quite the lucky bail out. You owe Miss Magnetism over there big time
Seem's Lady Luck has made you into her punchin' bag. Can't say I blame her, it's awfully hilarious.
What in the god damn...
What the...
The hell is that?
A man's chest can tell you a lot about him. For instance, let's see whether you go to the bar or gym more often.
Now THAT is a man of culture.
Pffft. Well.. that's quite the look ya got goin' there bud.
Well I'll be damned, Was that Lady Luck takin' action into her own hands?
Hmm. Seems you either don't go much anywhere or you keep yourself slim to stay nimble. Actually I could use someone of your build in the future...
Now that's a gut to be proud of! Proves you've got the wealth to feast like a true Cap'n.
You seem like the kind of man that could take a drink like a champ and a punch about the same! I bet you're a terror in a Tavern Brawl.
Well I'll be damned. With a look like that you must be quite the speed demon. Color me impressed.
Hot damn! Now that's the body of a terror! Don't let me go and get on your bad side now. Need to keep my fingers unbroken ya'know.
Ain't it a bit unfortunate that the ladies get such a wonderful thing to show off on their chests but all we get is a couple o' bumps and ridges?
No reason to be shy, partner. You should be excited and proud to show yourself off.
Hope ya don't mind havin' to strip down completely. I had to go a bit hard on ya' to make sure you had no hidden weapons under there. Ya'know, the only reason.

case.state: Nothin' wrong with a couple of guys comparin' sizes.Happens quite a lot out at sea.
It'll be a hard task but lets see if you can beat me out on size. Why not make a fun bet out of it?

state.text: Ah, don't worry yourself too much, partner, I've seen rowboats sail better than a cruise ship before.

case.state: Well that ruins the thrill of a risk, but a win is a win.

state.text: Well that ruins the thrill of a risk, but a win is a win.
Now that's a view to make many jealous.
Well I'll be damned, this was just one big plan to show off tonight wasn't it?
Lady Luck seems to favor you down below.
Why I never thought I'd hear these words leave my lips... But I'm actually quite jealous.
I'll be damned. I didn't know they came that large... it's almost needlessly large..

case.state: Well god damn! You're just goin' in guns a'blazin ain'tcha? Bold move, partner.

state.text: You get used to a lot of things when you live in Bilgewater. Lots of hair is one of those things.
Don't suppose you're tryin' to impress someone down there.
Well I'll be damned... Seem's she finished her business? Wait what the hell was the business she finished?!
I wonder if she still feels... Woah now Fate... That's a bit perverted even for you.
What man can't help but feel a bit excited when such an amazing sight awaits only a few seconds away.
Don't worry yourself too much now. I'm sure everyone here will be civilized enough to respect a woman's boundaries.
Ya'know, some of the smallest chests hold the greatest treasures.
Even with my charmin' looks, a wonderful sight such as this is a rare occasion for me.
A sight for sore eyes, for sure.
Holy shit that's possible?! I'll have to tell Jinx she isn't stuck as a washboard!
And here I thought you'd already impressed me enough tonight.
Seems tonight's adventure came with quite the bountiful harvest.
Seems we may be getting a two for one bonus tonight.
Can't ever complain about a two for one deal.
There better not be anything hidden in there! Like... knives... lots of knives.

case.state: Ma'am, there is no way you can't feel that strange presence around you! That's some strange creature followin' ya!
You've gotta be kiddin' me with that. What the hell is followin' you around like that, Sayaka?

state.text: Don't go thinkin' you'll get away without strippin' just cause you've got us all entranced already, ma'am.
Even with my wit, there's a limit to how charmin' I can be in this situation.
Well I'll be damned. Invisible panties. That's a new one.
Well hot damn! We may need an exorcist in here!

case.state: HOO LORD! That is a greatly appreciated surprise.

state.text: Thanks to the lack of healthy razor blades in Bilgewater, a trimmed crotch ain't much of a common find anyways.
Nothin' wrong with a bit of hair down below.
I'm sure everyone here knows the usual sayings when it comes to a clean shave.
Just like that the heavenly gates are now in sight.
Seems we found a secret tunnel entrance. I wonder if it leads to the buried treasure we've been lookin' for tonight?
Now there's quite the bounty to go after if I've ever seen one.
Don't suppose I could convince ya to let a third player join the party? Don't worry, here ya go.
Don't suppose I could convince ya to let a third player join the party? Don't worry, here ya go.
Don't suppose I could convince ya to let a third player join the party? Don't worry, here ya go.
Don't suppose I could convince ya to let a third player join the party? Don't worry, here ya go.
Don't suppose I could convince ya to let a third player join the party? Don't worry, here ya go.
Don't suppose I could convince ya to let a third player join the party? Don't worry, here ya go.
Don't suppose I could convince ya to let a third player join the party? Don't worry, here ya go.
Don't suppose I could convince ya to let a third player join the party? Don't worry, here ya go.

case.state: You really ain't a real talkative one are ya, ~target~. I mean, I've heard more words from a livin' statue.... Oh shit no offense.
Apologies, ~target~, if it seems I'm starin'. You just have such deep blue eyes that seem to pull my gaze into them.
(Yikes, ~target~ has quite the hostile feel to ~target.ifMale(him|her)~.I may wanna stay on ~target.ifMale(his|her)~ good side tonight.)
I'd watch out y'all. ~Target~ seems to be on the agitable side tonight. Don't wanna push ~target.ifMale(him|her)~ over the edge

(Well then, ~target~ seems to not have a worry in the world about losin' this round. Either ~target.ifMale(he|she)~ has something up ~target.ifMale(his|her)~ sleeve, or ~target.ifMale(he|she)~just doesn't care.)
You don't seem too worried to lose a round, ~target~. Don't suppose you're already content with strippin' down to nothin'?
(Just lookin' into ~target~'s eyes, I can tell ~target.ifMale(he's|she's)~ not all there inside.)
(I can tell this one will fall for an easy fib.) Hey there, ~target~, you can put any clothing you strip by me and I'll make sure to keep it in safe hands for you.
With a body like yours, ~target~, I'm not too surprised you're so happy to show it off.
Hey there, ~target~, if you're so fine with showin' your body off, I don't suppose you'd be willin' to let us get a feel?
(Well well well, it seems ~target~ is quite the swindler's dream! It truly is a shame tonight's not high stakes.)
Didn't quite expect to see someone of such an upper class here, ~target~.
It's quite the relief to see someone up to my standards of fashion at the table, ~target~.
Well now, seems I've got competition for the best dressed at the table tonight, isn't that right, ~target~.
Fweee-oooh I thought I was gonna be the only well dressed one tonight but it seems you've proved me wrong, ~target~.
Yikes, you doin' alright, ~target~? You seem like you'd rather drop dead than be here right now.
(~Target~ looks like ~target.ifMale(he's|she's)~ one minute away from breakin' out ~target.ifMale(his|her)~ sob story.)
(Don't go for the crazy ones Fate, you know better.) I must say, ~target~, the only thing crazy I see about you is you're crazy good looks. (Damn it Fate!)
(Somethin' ain't entirely right with that ~target~ ~target.ifMale(fellow|lass)~. Almost feel both scared, and aroused by them. Not a new combination at least.)
Yikes, is your goal to make enemies with everyone at the table or are you just naturally a bit of a ~target.ifMale(dick|cunt)~?
(This ~target.ifMale(guy|chick)~ has got some major attitude problems. Someone oughta put ~target~ in ~target.ifMale(his|her)~ place.)
I reckon, if you keep your attitude up, ~target~, you'll end up scarin' ~shy~ away pretty soon here.
If ya keep up the seductress act much longer, ~target~, you may not be leavin' this place alone tonight.
If you wanted to leave the game early for some one on one time, all you gotta do is ask, ~target~. No need to play the long game.
You really ain't a real talkative one are ya, ~target~. I mean, I've heard more words from a livin' statue.
(Man, ~target~ sure ain't sayin' much. Wonder if everythin's alright.)
I've been needin' a book smart ~target.ifMale(guy|gal)~ for some heists lately. I don't supposed I could sweet talk a smart one like you, ~target~, could I?
(~target~ is definitely quite the smart ~target.ifMale(guy|gal)~. I wonder how hard it would be to rope 'em into a heist or two.)
Jeesh, I understand wantin' to be the level headed one of the group, but don't you think you could let yourself go at least a little bit?
Pardon my intrusion, ~target~, but you've really gotta let loose a little bit. Have some fun for once.
(I'll be damned, trying to look into ~target~'s aura is like lookin' at a brick wall of emotions... I guess it's better to say lack there of...)
I'm surprised someone as much off a flustered mess as yourself even showed up tonight, ~target~.
Didn't expect to see someone here that's so nervous about this deal. I mean, you knew what you were coming to, right, ~target~?
I don't suppose someone here scared ya so bad you forgot how to talk, ~target~?
Ahem. This is a bit awkward when ya ain't sayin' much of a peep...
I wouldn't be surprised if this table is gonna need a cleaning after tonight with the way ~target~ is actin'. Not that I'm complainin'.
I'm surprised someone as into this as you are didn't just find an orgy to join, ~target~.
Now now, ~target~, no need to freak out, just think of it as you're invisible.
(I often forget people can be embarrassed about showin' themselves off with how common it is in Bilgewater.)
(That whole flustered look ~target~'s puttin' on surprisingly adds a whole layer of sexy to her look.)
Now now, ~target~, no need to freak out, just think of it as you're invisible.
(I often forget people can be embarrassed about showin' themselves off with how common it is in Bilgewater.)
(That whole flustered look ~target~'s puttin' on surprisingly adds a whole layer of sexy to his look.)
Don't get all flustered now, ~target~. Think of the fine ladies or gents you could get at the end of the night with your looks.
I must say, if I was raised in a different setting, I could a' easily gone down the adventurers path instead of the gamblin' life I live now.

state.text: You adventurers and I almost are like two sides of the same coin, both travelin' the world with a goal in mind. Only difference is the motives.

case.state: You artists are always quite the odd bunch, 'least where I'm from. There's some rumored artist who sees murder as some form of art or somethin' along those lines.
Well then, if there's two bounty hunters in one place that can't be a good sign. Makes ya wonder if someone at the table's in deep shit.
Ya' know, I never really bump into many fellow bounty hunters, maybe some day we could get a group toge-... Nevermind on that idea.
Ya know, crimes are such an up in the air subject. Anyone ya ask 'bout it will give ya a different answer so what's the point of followin' any of 'em?
The life of crime ain't to different from a normal life. It simply makes life more interestin' if you ask me.
The whole close quarters style never was my thing, too much risk involved. I'll just stick to the sly trickery when it comes to fighting, thank you very much.
Never quite saw the appeal of the whole up front and center deal for fighting. How are ya supposed to do a single thing without bein' noticed at that point?
Believe it or not, royalty ain't high on most swindlers target lists in Bilgewater. That's partially 'cause the lack of 'em out there and the fact everything they've got is too big to carry.
Eh, royalty never was a big thing in my eyes, all it is to me is a worthless target on your back.
I often forget schoolin' exists outside of just home schoolin'. Unless you've got somethin' specific in mind, no sense learnin' more than what's needed.
Never understood the desire for goin' to school. I learned all I needed in my own tent, and I'm livin' the easy life thanks to that.
No matter what magical talents you've got up your sleeves, nothin' will ever compare to the unique style of my cards.
I'm sure you've got some neat magic of your own, but I'm certain it won't top my abilities.
(Well now, somethin's tellin' me ~target~'s got quite the wealth behind ~target.ifMale(his|her)~ name. Better keep watch on 'em)
(The second I even take a look at ~target~, all I see is big bags o' cash. I may wanna make friends with ~target.ifMale(him|her)~ for now.)
I didn't know we we're allowed to bring a plus one. Might have to talk Graves into comin' out here one night.
Well now, if I knew we were allowed plus ones I would've brought out my partner, Graves. He'd enjoy this kind of place for sure.
Now there's somethin' I can get behind, ~target~. How 'bout we play a drinkin' game or two?
I could get behind havin' a few drinks tonight, so why don't we play a few drinkin' games, ~target~?

state.text: Oh, I'm just sayin' guys aren't always the brutish slobs a lot of people assume when it comes to a more risque situation such as this.

case.state: Ma'am, the reward is playin' such a game with fine ladies like yourself tonight.
The reward is the view of fine ladies such as yourself at the end of tonight's game, ma'am.

state.text: Seems ya got too used to Lady Luck's blessings. Time for the withdrawal.
Every game's gotta have at least one loser. Seems you were just the poor unfortunate soul to be chosen first.
Damn, what did you do to piss off Lady Luck this bad?!
Tsk, tsk. You really must've upset Lady Luck to be stuck in such a position.
I'll be damned, you sure are on Lady Luck's shitlist tonight, ain'tcha?
Barely even a chink in the wall seperatin' them from us.
Barely even a leap across the gap between them and us.

case.state: No need to get worked up over it. One loss ain't the end of the world now.
Well, then how 'bout your hometown? You don't happen to be from a port town? Buncha tall buildin's and high bridges? Sea monsters all around?
How 'bout your hometown then? Ya happen to be from an old port town with high up buildin's and bridges with sea monsters all around?
Alright, smart ass. No, what I'm saying is I see myself in you. Oh, god damn it, don't even say it. I have some, fortune-tellin' like abilities and ours seem pretty similar.
I also know what came of them... And you for that matter. See, there's reasons I don't like readin' fortunes and memories. It's quite the invasion of privacy, even for myself.
I've also seen what happened to them... and you for that matter. Never was a fan of readin' memories. Feel's like an invasion of privacy, even for myself.
I s'pose I can understand that feelin'. Though you sure look fine for such a nasty soundin' headache.
I reckon I can get where you're comin' from. Though you're look ain't matchin' what you just described.

state.text: While it sure is a smart concept to avoid money, it sure ain't an excitin' lifestyle I'd assume.
Well now, poker as a form of therapy you say? I must say that's an angle I've never thought of.
She seems like quite the interesting lady. One of these days you have to to introduce me to her if ya don't mind.
My oh my, I may have to get to know this fine lady. Any chance you could set somethin' up between her and I?
Ouch, and here I thought I finally found someone with a fashion sense as fine as mine.
First you insult the looks and then the name?! Why you little devil woman!
Amber? No, that's not who I'm thinkin' o... Oh god there's another like Zoe?
No the girl I'm thinkin' of is named Zoe... Oh dear god is there another like her?
Well then, it seems I may have to show ya what these hands can do at the table before we see what yours can do under the table.
Well now, sounds like you'd fit right in back in Bilgewater. I could see you and I swindlin' some fools outta some easy cash, ya feel?
Oh, there's no need to worry 'bout me. I'm quite tame compared to most in Runeterra. You got a pyromaniac child, souls of the damned, magic pop stars. Bit of it all, you know?
So you carry some apple around with ya all times and it just doesn't rot away? What, is it some sort of enchanted apple?
See there it is again. I was just givin' a lil' heads up and you go off with the sarcastic tone. I ain't tryin' to start off on bad terms with a lady in mere minutes now...
I'll be damned, a first timer to this type of deal? Well just know this, Miss, I'll make sure no boundaries are crossed.
I don't know much on him but there's this large, and I mean large statue in Demacia. Some kind of anti-magic statue that fights for 'em.
I can't quite remember a lot on him, but there's this large statue over in Demacia that fights for 'em. I believe he's made of some anti-magic material.

Well, this kind of place certainly helps many folk learn 'bout themselves and others, so came to the right place. No need to worry 'bout the fine clothing, as you can see I'm in quite the get up myself.
Well I'll be damned, that must have some influence on the town name... anyways, no, ma'am, I'm refferin' to my home town. Full of constant chaos and action to report on.
That's a perfectly fine reason, but if you really wanna be the biggest hit with the ladies, you should grow it into a handlebar mustache.
Well if you're lookin' for a real unique style, try growin' it into a handlebar mustache. Only know one guy with it and he's pal from home.
So what I'm hearin' is this armor is a one of a kind type of deal? What's it made out of if ya' don't mind me askin'?
It's a one of a kind then? Quite curious then what it's made out of, if ya don't mind me askin'.
Ah, so I'm takin' it you're a warrior of sorts then! It's quite refreshin' to see someone who enjoys both a good brawl and lookin' well kept.
Well now, Definitely quite the look for a fighter then. Not often I bump into a warrior with a sense of fashion. Other than myself, that is.
That's perfectly fair, it's just not often a noble would come to a place such as this, though you definitely have the looks to be a hit here.
Oh, I meant no harm by asking. Just ain't a common occurrence to see a noble in such a place. I'm sure with looks as fine as yours, you'll be a hit here none the less.

case.state: Hey now, I never said there was anythin' wrong with it. Soft hands feel the best along the skin, such a realxin' feelin'.
All ya got left is those damn shades and your underwear. You'll lose in no time thanks to your ridiculous stunt.
Just think, If you would'a kept all that clothin' you wouldn't be about to lose in a few turns.
Phew. That's relievin' to hear. Didn't need some lil' ball of chaos at my table.You mentioned lookin' for someone though?
Phew. Thank Lady Luck you ain't some lil' Yordle runt. Though, what is it with that enormous hammer you wield?
No rush. Missy. I'm sure we've all got time to spare.
So ya got caught in some time shift deal? What do ya think of the future so far, then?
A man from the past caught in a time shift? Well how ya enjoyin' the future then?

state.text: Oh don't worry, Miss Penny. I can assure you by the end of the game, your eyes wont be the only thing stuck to me.
If the game continues down its current path, I can assure you your eyes won't be the only thing stuck to me, Miss Penny.

case.state: My eyes?... Maybe so, but with every second my eyes lock with yours, any painful feeling is alleviated.
I assure you, Miss Penny, even if my eyes were to never work again, I'd still know your looks are worthy of a goddess.
Why, whats wrong with a guy askin' another how to keep a fine shape? I'm sure there wouldn't be any complications too wild for myself.
Now now, Missy, no need for a fuss. No one sent me. Besides, wouldn't I need to be the one to worry 'bout you and your mage seeker goons apprehendin' me on the spot?
Mostly your damned higher ups. For instance, most of your family and the royals with their anti magic bullshit. Assholes, all of 'em.
Now now, Missy, no need to freak out. I'm just verifyin' my sources, I'm sure you understand. Then what is your reason for leavin', if that's not the case?
Well, that would definitely explain the fine shape you've built up then. I couldn't imagine the strength you've got stored in your arms alone. You'll have to show me some tricks someday.
Hey now, Missy. You implyin' I ain't a commitin' man? I'll have you know I've been in... Let's see... one... one and a half? I've been in about two relationships!
A lumberjack, hm? You've definitely got quite the body for the job.In fact, it gives me a mix of jealousy and excitement seein' a lady with a bod like yours.
A lumberjack you say? Not too surprisin' with a body like yours. In fact, I'm both jealous and quite interested seein' a lady of your stature tonight.
In a whi--- What in the world could cause someone to glue their eyes together at some point?!
In a whi--- How the hell has anyone ever even done somethin' somewhat close to gluin' their eyes shut?!
That so? I'll be damned. If a ship ever came into Bilgewater with a navigator, They'd likely end up bein' the top pirate crew we got out there.
Well I'll be damned! I'd bet if even a single crew came into Bilgewater with a navigator, they'd be the top pirates around.
Well that's the thing. Dates ain't the most common occurrence in Bilgewater. Closest things to dates those folk do is an ol' fashioned heist with each other.
I'm sure you wouldn't much enjoy a Bilgewater date. They usually entail some sort of heist or any kind of illegal activity.
Just killin' two birds with one stone. I'm always interested in such a unique choice of attire, so there's definitely some interest.
Figured I'd hit ya with a two for one is all, though I'm almost always interested in such a unique choice of attire.
You became a pirate because you were rescued? Gotta say your whole pirate ordeal is soundin' more and more confusin'. Next you'll tell me you ain't even a pirate of the sea.
No no, Miss. What I'm sayin' is you must have quite the toned body under all that clothing. Hoping I'll get to take a closer look by the end of the night.
I'm afraid you misunderstood, Miss. What I'm sayin' is you must have quite the toned body underneath that outfit of yours. I'm quite excited to see if I'm right tonight.
Somethin' just as stinky? What the hell could you mea...

state.text: Ya seem awfully fond of that rocket launcher of yours. Mind me askin' why ya take it with ya everywhere ya go? Seems a bit... inefficient.
You sure seem to be talkin' some big game here. You better be able to follow through.
Lookin' for a friend, hm? Odd place to search for them. What would you say they look like? I've got quite the eye for findin' people with a good description.

case.state: Hm... The name? Well I've had it for so long I can't quite remember when it started. But it's a name that implies my set of skills. When I'm involved, Fate gets a little... twisted.

state.text: (What could he-) {b}WHAT IN GOD DAMN?!{!reset}
(What is he thinki-) {b}WHAT IN THE GOD DAMN?!{!reset}

case.state: Now, go on, strip for everyone at the table and feel the shame you've earned.
Just know I'll be relishing in the sweet and easy victory you've given me tonight.
WHAT THE HELL?!
ARE YOU FUCKING INSANE?!
Hold on a sec... where the hell did the---
God damn, they're bouncin' everywhere! Duck and cover!
I'm not even afraid of gettin' shot anymore! Now its just plain annoyin'.
No chance of goin' back then? And here I was, imaginin' the heists we could pull off if my brains and your brawns were put together. So what's the reason of leavin' that life?
I'll be damned, the more I hear of you the more I'm thinkin' were some sort of clonin' experiment. Hope ya don't mind me pryin' a bit more on that topic?
Then why don't I take ya to Bilgewater and help you branch out a bit more? Find ya a woman or a man to help soothe your nerves if ya catch my drift.
What I'm tryin' to say is you look quite beautfiul, Ma'am. The clothin' is simply the cherry on top.
What I'm implyin' is that you've got quite the beautiful look, Ma'am.. The clothin' simply helps accentuate it.
Well that's a shame, but you have a good eye when it comes to outfits nonetheless. Is fashion at least a big thing in your home town?
I've just never met such a fine looking girl with such a need to serve. Makes me desire a tasty dinner, followed by an even tastier dessert in bed.
Well now, such weak points just out in the open like that. A small pinch or firm massage on your ears could bring you trembling to the knees, and I'm sure we'd know where to go from there.
I can bet that imagination of yours can think up ideas raunchy enough to rival my own.
I'm almost certain you're imaginin' even raunchier things than myself. Which is quite an accomplishment.
Hey, that just means more attention from you which is enough treatment to help any problem I'm havin'.
Hmm, very well. Tell me then, Angela. What's the best way to get to your heart then? Other than surgery, of course.

state.text: Planeptune... The word planet but ending with your name. Yea, no. I'm callin' your bluff there, missy.
You're tellin' me lil' ol' you runs an entire nation, named after yourself? I'll believe that when I see it.

case.state: Appears my intuition was right then. You seemed like the type of folk I'd see back on the rift... Just not as... interestin'. No offense.
